description: Replace bread with flavoursome polenta triangles with your favourite bruschetta toppings.
name: Polenta "Bruschetta" Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2.8 cup vegetable stock, made with 1 stock cube

recipeInstructions.text: Bring the stock to the boil in a large pan and slowly whisk in the polenta in a steady stream. Cook for 4-5 minutes, stirring constantly, until it begins to thicken. Stir in the parmesan. Pour the mix into a lined baking tin and place in the fridge to chill for 1 hour.
Cut the firmed up polenta into 9 triangles. Brush the triangles with half of the olive oil. Heat a griddle pan and cook each triangle for 4 minutes on each side, until crisp.
Mix the tomatoes, sundried tomatoes, garlic and basil with the remaining olive oil. Top each triangle with the tomato mix and serve.
